subject: African Cup of Nations (Soccer)
Soccer
Civil War and Guerrilla Warfare
lead_paragraph: Gunmen in an area plagued by separatist violence used machine guns to open fire Friday on a bus carrying Togo’s national soccer team to a tournament in Angola.
snippet: Gunmen in an area plagued by separatist violence used machine guns to open fire Friday on a bus carrying Togo’s national soccer team to a tournament in Angola.
